item.title: EP 119 - Homunculus Recipes
item.itunes:title: Homunculus Recipes
item.description:
Killer kites, deadly predictions and man creating man without women today on Dead Rabbit Radio!

Patreon
https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

MERCH STORE!!!
https://tinyurl.com/y8zam4o2

Pakistan’s Spring Festival should be a time of celebration, but instead it’s an occasion of kite lacerations!

Then an author writes book that predicts the sinking of the Titanic 14 years before it even set sail. Also, a man fights a polar bear on the iceberg in his book.

And finally, we look at the disgusting history of homunculus recipes. What are they, do they work, and do you have any horse dung I can borrow?

Links:

11 Dead, Over 100 Hurt at Kite Flying Festival in Pakistan

https://www.foxnews.com/story/11-dead-over-100-hurt-at-kite-flying-festival-in-pakistan

The Wreck of the Titan: Or, Futility

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Wreck_of_the_Titan:_Or,_Futility

Author ‘Predicts’ Titanic Sinking, 14 Years Earlier

http://newsfeed.time.com/2012/04/14/author-predicts-titanic-sinking-14-years-earlier/

Alchemical Recipe for a Homunculus: Sperm + Rotting Meat = Mini Artificial Human

https://www.ancient-origins.net/history/alchemical-recipe-homunculus-sperm-rotting-meat-mini-artificial-human-009836

How to Make a Homunculus and Other Horrors

https://www.stufftoblowyourmind.com/blogs/how-to-make-a-homunculus-and-other-horrors.htm

HOW TO MAKE A HOMUNCULUS

https://www.dailygrail.com/2017/11/how-to-make-a-homunculus/

How to make a homunculus (Homunculus #1)

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HNLPXzlz6-I

Homunculus

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Homunculus

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

------------------------------------------------

"As Above" Art By Grant Scott

Closing Song: "Bella Royale"
